only_rcode.label: Include Only RCODE
only_rcode.description: Filter out any queries which are not the given RCODE

only_qname_suffix.label: Include Only QName With Suffix
only_qname_suffix.description: Filter out any queries whose QName does not end in a suffix on the list

cardinality.label: Cardinality
cardinality.description: Metrics counting the unique number of items in the stream

dns_transactions.label: DNS Transactions (Query/Reply pairs)
dns_transactions.description: Metrics based on tracking queries and their associated replies

top_dns_wire.label: Top N Metrics (Various)
top_dns_wire.description: Top N metrics across various details from the DNS wire packets

top_qnames.label: Top N QNames (All)
top_qnames.description: Top QNames across all DNS queries in stream

top_qnames_by_rcode.label: Top N QNames (Failing RCodes)
top_qnames_by_rcode.description: Top QNames across failing result codes

ip_cardinality.label: IP Address Cardinality
ip_cardinality.description: Unique IP addresses seen in the stream

top_geo.label: Top Geo
top_geo.description: Top Geo IP and ASN in the stream

top_ips.label: Top IPs
top_ips.description: Top IP addresses in the stream
